value:
$nMPID_ベレト|Seeing Sothis give thanks for the
bountiful harvest... It makes me think
man and god may not be so different.

$nMPID_ベレト|I find myself paying more attention to
Sothis than the festival, but I'm used
to looking after others as a professor.

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|You're sure to be impressed by my
repertoire of tricks and—huh? I'm not
supposed to actually trick anyone?

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|I saw the strangest thing... It seems
someone spared no effort in carving a
face into a pumpkin! But...why?

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|I'm still not convinced this costume
isn't someone's idea of playing a trick
on me.$k$pThese mortal customs will never
cease to elude me...

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Trick or treat! The harvest festival
is in full swing over at your friend
$Nf's castle!

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|If the goal is to collect sweets, then I
won't be satisfied until our pockets
are bursting. Look sharp, partner!

$nMPID_ベレト|I think we need to focus, Sothis.
Let's set the trick-playing aside for
now, OK?
$nMPID_ベレト|Not much of a treat at all...

$nMPID_ベレト|We give thanks to the land for a
bountiful harvest, and we give thanks
for lessons learned as well.

I am Sothis, and this is Byleth. That is
quite enough with the pleasantries.
We're here for the harvest festival!

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Feast your eyes upon our veritable
mountain of sweets! I daresay we
gathered nearly every piece in Askr!$k$pEveryone gazed in awe when I asked
for candy. Has word of my eminence
already reached this kingdom?$k$p$nMPID_ベレト|Maybe they were surprised to see
what appeared to be a child running
through the castle unattended.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Excuse me?! No mortal would be
foolish enough to mistake the mighty
progenitor god for a mere child!$k$p$nMPID_ベレト|I suppose. Child or adult, man or god,
what truly matters is that the harvest
festival is a time for celebration.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Truly... In any case, it is rare that you
and I do not share corporeal form, so
we should make the best of it. Come!
てやあっ
祭りじゃ！
うわあっ
何を…！？
いけない…！
$nMPID_二人|Trick or treat!
$nMPID_二人|Let us celebrate! Yes, let's.
$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Surrender your sweets!
$nMPID_ベレト|Your candy will be ours.
So many sweets not savored...
Careful now.
I have your back.
"The time for tricks is nigh!" "Let's not be rash."
"The candy is ours." "A noble pursuit indeed!"
ふふん…
"This attire is...quite odd." "Do you think?"
Hmm...
I smell something sweet...
Let's enjoy the festivities.

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Mm, I must say, these sweets have fully
surpassed even my lofty expectations.
I insist you try this one next!

$nMPID_ベレト|You eat a lot. I'm not sure I can take
much more.

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|I suppose I assumed too much of you
mortals. Hmph...what a shame.$k$pIt's a rare occasion being able to enjoy
such a bountiful feast.

Speaking of rarities, it feels quite
strange to be...how should I put it?
Independent in mind and body.
$nMPID_ベレト|That it does.

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Now that I have a corporeal form to call
my own, there are many things I have
begun to notice for the first time.$k$pOne of which is your height.

I must appear a mere child in your
shadow. To think that I would be
beneath you in stature...

$nMPID_ベレト|People may think we're father
and daughter.

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Surely you jest!$k$p*sigh* I see that I am no more capable
of reading your expressions from
outside your mind than I am within.

In any case, I cannot deny that walking
around with you like this during the
festival is quite entertaining.

Even better, the rest of the world can
finally see how delightful I can be!
$nMPID_ベレト|Is that how you see yourself?

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|What? No! Of course not. I...it is my
turn to jest!
$nMPID_ベレト|If you say so.

$nMPID_比翼ソティス|Good. Now that that's settled, we have
more pressing matters to attend to. Our
sweets supply seems to have run dry.

In the spirit of the harvest festival,
we must venture forth and gather
more tasty treats, posthaste!

We should have no trouble getting more
candy with costumes as remarkable as
these. After all, I am delightful, aren't I?
